name: trio of snowflakes
notes:
this trio of snowflakes pattern works up really fast and does not use much yarn at all!
great little decorations for winter time or glue them onto a plain card to make your own christmas cards or hang them as decorations.
i have also included tutorials for these snowflakes, to help those who are yet not confident with written patterns!

enjoy crocheting!
kat
